Others: Bronny James scored his first points in an NBA game on a shot that looked just like his old man LeBron James
Bronny James' first points came in a blowout loss to the Cleveland Cavaliers
LeBron James watched from the bench as Bronny made his first points
LeBron James expressed pride in his son's achievement
Bronny James' first points were made on a 14-foot shot from the left corner
